info.title: PDF4me Excel
info.description: Comprehensive Excel document processing API providing advanced automation capabilities including data manipulation, formatting, security, watermarking, and conversion. Perfect for enterprise workflow automation and document processing pipelines.

post.description: Add customizable text headers and footers to Excel worksheets with full formatting control - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/add-text-header-footer

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for adding text headers and footers

post.description: Add image-based headers and footers to Excel worksheets with precise positioning and margin control - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/add-image-header-footer

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for adding image headers and footers

post.description: Remove specific header and footer elements from Excel worksheets - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/remove-header-footer

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for removing headers and footers

post.description: Insert new rows into Excel worksheets using JSON data with automatic data type conversion and formatting - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/excel/add-rows

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for adding rows to Excel

post.description: Update existing rows in Excel worksheets with JSON data and precise cell targeting - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/update-rows

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for updating rows in Excel

post.description: Delete specific rows from Excel worksheets using row ranges - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/delete-rows

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for deleting rows from Excel

post.description: Extract specific rows from Excel worksheets and convert to JSON format with advanced filtering options - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/extract-rows

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for extracting rows from Excel

post.description: Extract specific worksheets from Excel workbooks and return as JSON data - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/extract-worksheets
Delete specific worksheets from Excel workbooks - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/delete-worksheets
Merge multiple Excel files into a single workbook with support for various output formats - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/merge-files

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for merging Excel files

post.description: Merge rows across multiple worksheets using key columns for data consolidation - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/merge-rows
Add customizable text watermarks to Excel worksheets with advanced positioning and styling options - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/add-watermark
Remove watermarks from Excel worksheets by ID or from all worksheets - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/remove-watermark
Find and replace text in Excel worksheets with advanced pattern matching and formatting options - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/replace-text
Add password protection and security restrictions to Excel files - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/secure-excel

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for securing Excel files

post.description: Remove password protection and security restrictions from Excel files - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/unlock-excel

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for unlocking Excel files

post.description: Parse CSV files and convert to Excel format with customizable delimiters and formatting - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/excel/excel/parse-csv

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Request object for parsing CSV files

docContent.description: Input file content from the source

document.description: document

name.description: Input file name from the source
name.title: File Name

HeaderLeft.description: Text content for the left section of the header

HeaderCenter.description: Text content for the center section of the header

HeaderRight.description: Text content for the right section of the header

FooterLeft.description: Text content for the left section of the footer

FooterCenter.description: Text content for the center section of the footer

FooterRight.description: Text content for the right section of the footer

HeaderLeftColor.description: Color for the left header text (hex code or color name)

HeaderLeftFontSize.description: Font size for the left header text

HeaderCenterColor.description: Color for the center header text (hex code or color name)

HeaderCenterFontSize.description: Font size for the center header text

HeaderRightColor.description: Color for the right header text (hex code or color name)

HeaderRightFontSize.description: Font size for the right header text

FooterLeftColor.description: Color for the left footer text (hex code or color name)

FooterLeftFontSize.description: Font size for the left footer text

FooterCenterColor.description: Color for the center footer text (hex code or color name)

FooterCenterFontSize.description: Font size for the center footer text

FooterRightColor.description: Color for the right footer text (hex code or color name)

FooterRightFontSize.description: Font size for the right footer text

WorksheetNames.description: Comma-separated list of worksheet names to apply headers/footers to (leave empty for all)

WorksheetIndexes.description: Comma-separated list of worksheet indexes (1-based) to apply headers/footers to (leave empty for all)

CultureName.description: Culture name for formatting (e.g., en-US, fr-FR, de-DE)

Position.description: Position of the image in the header footer

InsertFromRow.description: Row number where to start inserting data (1-based)

InsertFromColumn.description: Column number where to start inserting data (1-based)

TableName.description: Name of Excel table to add rows to (if applicable)

ExcelRowNumber.description: Integer containing Excel Row Number If Table Name Is Given.

ConvertNumericAndDate.description: Automatically convert numeric and date values to proper Excel data types

DateFormat.description: Format pattern for date values (e.g., yyyy-MM-dd, dd/MM/yyyy)

NumericFormat.description: Format pattern for numeric values (e.g., N2, C, P)

IgnoreAttributeTitles.description: Skip JSON property names when inserting data

IgnoreNullValues.description: Skip null values from JSON data

CultureName.description: Culture name for data formatting (e.g., en-US, fr-FR, de-DE)

WorksheetName.description: Name of the worksheet to extract from (leave empty for first worksheet)

HasHeaderRow.description: Whether the first row contains column headers

FirstRow.description: Starting row for extraction (0-based, 0 = first row)

LastRow.description: Ending row for extraction (-1 for last row with data)

FirstColumn.description: Starting column for extraction (0-based, 0 = first column)

LastColumn.description: Ending column for extraction (-1 for last column with data)

ExcludeEmptyRows.description: Skip rows that are completely empty

ExportValuesAsText.description: Export all cell values as text strings

ExportEmptyCells.description: Include empty cells in the output

ExportAsObject.description: Export data as structured object instead of array

HyperlinkFormat.description: How to handle hyperlinks in cells

Culture.description: Culture name for data formatting (e.g., en-US, fr-FR, de-DE)
